summary: Minerva currently works as a CIO at ServerPoint.Com, a leading web hosting company, where she directs IT staff, budgeting, policies and procedures. She is a forward-thinking, results-driven Manager, Leader and Business Strategist with almost 20 years of experience in diverse sectors including business management, marketing, customer service, and real estate investment among others. She has a remarkable talent for turning around complex projects and delivering quick and permanent solutions. Her management career is marked by demonstrated ability to help organizations execute their business and technical strategies through organizational development, effective staff management and communications.  Minerva’s diplomacy, persuasiveness and strong organizational and analytical skills help her to “speak the language” of every department within the organization.
name: Minerva Gonzalez
title: Chief Information Officer - CIO at ServerPoint.Com - Passionate Investor/Entrepreneur
